TopicTitle: A 'to scale' image of Kerbin and it's Natural Satellites

Articles.Content:
All pictures were taken in game from an altitude of 1 million meters to show the size differences between the bodies. Edited using Paint.net and Serif.

80% of information from the KSP wiki. The rest from ma brain.

I intend to continue this for the new planets and their moons in the next version!

Hope you like it or find it useful/interesting, and try to ignore the differing lighting angles

Feedback always welcome!

(SPOILER Y U NO WORK)
